bill_title: revise the distribution of funds from the alcoholic beverage fund.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the distribution of funds from the alcoholic beverage fund. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 35-5 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The secretary shall distribute thirty-seven and one-half percent of the revenue deposited in the alcoholic beverage fund to the counties. The secretary shall distribute one-half of the total county share to each county based on the ratio of the assessed valuation of the county to the total assessed valuation of all counties. The secretary shall distribute the other one-half of the total county share to each county based on the ratio of population of the county to the total population of all counties. The secretary shall base the allocation of the money on the most recent assessed valuations as published by the Department of Revenue and the most recent decennial census of the United States Department of Commerce, Bureau of the Census. The secretary shall make distributions to each county auditor by November first, February first, May first, and August first of each year. The secretary shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay each county its share of the distribution. Section 2. That § 35-5-28 be amended to read as follows: 35-5-28. After determination is made of the necessary reserve to provide for the reversions to municipalities and counties distribution to each municipality and county as provided in § 35-5-22 and section 1 of this Act , the balances remaining may be transferred to the general fund.
